Title: Integrated Authentication & Authorization
Description:
The goal of this project is developing an authentication, authorization, and profile provider web service to provide security services to the other web application (consumers) with central web based management application to manage users, roles and users in roles.
It's based on MS provider model (MembershipProvider, RoleProvider, ProfileProvider) and easily could be used in the security consumer application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The goal of this project is developing an authentication, authorization, and profile provider web service to provide security services to the other web application (consumers) with central web based management application to manage users, roles and users in roles.
It's based on MS provider model (MembershipProvider, RoleProvider, ProfileProvider) and easily could be used in the security consumer application.
